content: sl1 wyif p to end turn repeat row 1 and 2 11 13 15 17 more times work one additional rs row as row 1 heel turn row 1 ws sl1 wyif p13 15 17 19 p2tog p1 turn row 2 rs sl1 wyib k5 ssk k1 turn row 3 ws sl1 wyif p to one stitch before gap p2tog p1 turn row 4 rs sl1 wyib k to one stitch before gap ssk k1 turn repeat row 3 and 4 until all gaps have been closed and all heel sts worked ending with a rs row the last reps of row 3 and 4 will not include the final p1 and k1 respectively do not turn after the final rs row 14 16 18 20 heel sts © rachel leggett 2019 3 return to working in the round your heel turn has just ended on a rs row continue working this row in the following manner pick up and knit 12 14 16 18 sts along first side of the heel flap pick up and knit 1 additional st in the corner between heel flap and instep sts 13 15 17 19 sts picked up place instep m work the next 24 28 32 36 sts as they appear k the knits and p the purls place instep m pick up and knit 1 st in corner between instep and heel flap then pick up and knit 12 14 16 18 sts along second side of heel flap 13 15 17 19 sts picked up knit all heel sts place m to indicate new bor 64 74 84 94 sts you have now returned all sts to your needles and are ready to continue working in the round gusset round 1 k to 3 sts before instep m k2tog k1 work instep sts as they appear k the knits and p the purls to m k1 ssk k to bor m round 2 k to m work instep sts as they appear k the knits and p the purls to m k to bor m repeat rnds 1 and 2 until 48 56 64 72 sts remain foot foot round k to instep m work all sts as they appear k the knits and p the purls k to bor m repeat foot round until work measures 2 inches less than desired length toe setup partial round remove bor m k to instep m remove instep m place bor m round 1 k1 ssk work all sts as they appear k the knits and p the purls to 3 sts before instep m k2tog k1 sl m k1 ssk k to last 3 sts k2tog k1 4 sts decreased round 2 work all sts as they appear k the knits and p the purls to end repeat rnds 1 and 2 until 24 28 32 36 sts remain then repeat round 1 twice more at the end of your decreases you should have 16 20 24 28 stitches remaining
